title: Annie is WAY WAY WAY too tanky. (and overloaded)
body:
Annie is a burst mage. She should not have 3500 HP through normal items and then 200 armor and 100 Mr on top of that. With Spell Vamp runes, annie can EASILY 1v1 any fighter, kiting, stunning, and healing much more damage than any fighter can deal. 
I can't believe annie is allowed to exist in this state.
SHE SHOULD NOT BE A TANK, SHE IS AN AP MAGE FFS.
Add to that that she has no counters in lane with very exclusive exceptions, the easiest laning phase in the game with her Q farming and stuns, and the longest range besides trist or maybe jhin now, annie is just way to strong at the moment. 

Riot needs to take SOMETHING out of annies overloaded kit to balance her. She should not be able to do everything.
Remove her defensive buffs that make her a broken *** tank that can 1 hit an entire team with 4k hp and 200 resistances, 
or make her lane actually challenging and make it possible to shut her down in lane with more than 2 champs. 
or just completely make her a utility mage and cut her damage in half.

I can't speak for high elo, but I know that below Plat, its pretty much agreed upon that annie is a complete joke. Not only is she extremely overloaded, she takes ABSOLUTELY NO SKILL to play reasonably well, or well enough to carry with her. Champs like her are a cancer to the game.

I play Brand, and I feel you. There are a few issues though.

> Annie can't hit you with a pillar of fire from a mile away. Ever tried farming vs Brand with a low range champion like Kayle ? Most miserable experience you will ever have I guarantee.

This here is because the Brand was smart. Pillar of Flame is a telegraphed AOE explosion with a .75 second delay. Easily avoidable with boots. My guess is that the Brand waited till you tried to CS before casting it beneath your feet. Your AA delay wouldn't let you move out of the way in time.

There are two ways to keep a Brand on his toes. You can farm with your abilites and force him to use his to farm under tower. Pillar is maxed first, and I will OOM if I spam that spell along with Conflaguration to farm or harass. This leads to another thing.

I cannot harass you forever. I will OOM and then I cannot fight you effectively. Wait till a Brand is about 100-200 mana, then fight him. At most I can only do a pillar and a fireball. Then I'm helpless. If a Brand is constantly harasing you from farm chances are you are still pretty full mana-wise, so you can go all in on him and hit him with multiple rotations. You will get a flash or a kill. Brand's damage is gated behind his passive. His damage has been lowered across the board and loaded into a passive that rewards him for getting multiple hits on an enemy.

> In all fairness, Brand only started becoming a problem when they gave him that ridiculous new passive and pair that with Thunderlords, and his damage becomes over the top.

No offense, but what kind of Brands are you fighting? Deathfire is better on Brand 100% of the time. The burn refreshes with the passive burn so well, and Deathfire has no cooldown. It's like I'm doubling up on my burn. Add {{item:3151}} and I can watch health melt.
